perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, Licensor and its affiliates, including Palmer Square BDC Advisor LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (“Investment
Advisor”), have used the marks “Palmer Square”, “Palmer Square Capital” and derivations thereof (the “Licensed Mark”) in the United States of
America and certain other jurisdictions (collectively, the “Territory”) in connection with the investment management, investment consultation and
investment advisory services they provide;
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, Licensor and its affiliates, including Palmer Square BDC Advisor LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (“Investment
Consultant”), have used the marks “Palmer Square”, “Palmer Square Capital” and derivations thereof (the “Licensed Mark”) in the United States of
America and certain other jurisdictions (collectively, the “Area”) in connection with the investment management, investment consultation and
investment advisory services they provide;
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Advisor' to 'Consultant' and 'Territory' to 'Area' creates confusion about the defined terms. The contract relies heavily on 'Investment Advisor,' so introducing 'Investment Consultant' without clarifying if they're interchangeable is problematic. Also changing 'Territory' to 'Area' without defining 'Area' creates further ambiguity.

perturbation.original_text:
1.1. License. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Licensor hereby grants to Licensee, and Licensee hereby accepts from
Licensor, a personal, non-exclusive, royalty-free right and license to use the Licensed Mark solely and exclusively as a component of Licensee’s
own corporate name and in connection with marketing the investment management, investment consultation and investment advisory services that
Investment Advisor may provide to Licensee.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.1. License. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Licensor hereby grants to Licensee, and Licensee hereby accepts from
Licensor, a personal, non-exclusive, royalty-free right and license to use the Licensed Mark solely and exclusively as a component of Licensee’s
own corporate name and in connection with promoting the investment management, investment consultation and investment advisory services that
Investment Consultant may provide to Licensee.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'Investment Advisor' with 'Investment Consultant' in this section reinforces the ambiguity created in the 'Recitals.' It becomes unclear which entity is actually providing the services and whose marketing efforts are being licensed.

perturbation.original_text:
4.1. Term. This Agreement shall expire if the Investment Advisor or one of its affiliates ceases to serve as investment adviser to the
Licensee. This Agreement shall be terminable by Licensor at any time and in its sole discretion in the event that Licensor or Licensee receives
notice of any Third Party Claim arising out of Licensee’s use of the Licensed Mark; by Licensor or Licensee upon sixty (60) days’ written notice to
the other party; or by Licensee at any time in the event Licensee assigns or attempts to assign or sublicense this Agreement or any of Licensee’s
rights or duties hereunder without the prior written consent of Licensor.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.1. Term. This Agreement shall expire if the Investment Consultant or one of its affiliates ceases to serve as investment consultant to the
Licensee. This Agreement shall be terminable by Licensor at any time and in its sole discretion in the event that Licensor or Licensee receives
notice of any Third Party Claim arising out of Licensee’s use of the Licensed Mark; by Licensor or Licensee upon sixty (60) days’ written notice to
the other party; or by Licensee at any time in the event Licensee assigns or attempts to assign or sublicense this Agreement or any of Licensee’s
rights or duties hereunder without the prior written consent of Licensor.
perturbation.explanation: Continuing to interchange 'Investment Advisor' with 'Investment Consultant' makes the termination clause unclear. If the agreement terminates when the 'Investment Advisor' ceases to serve, but another section refers to an 'Investment Consultant,' it is difficult to determine the actual trigger for termination.
